## Source: amazon-inspector (229ec4207198813ec81b334b0a5ac72c964258b80165cda21a1c25564819ad83)

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (e986a48968e4a5cee76b31da2c10ef775957dea3648d8d25d5979ccf1ab817a2)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'mui7' @ 99.99.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
